Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufrn.imd.database.DataBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDAO

    public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDAO
    Singleton class that will represent the DataBase of the running instance of the app
